web_snippets: In her five bestselling novels, Rochelle Weinstein writes about the human condition and heartfelt emotions while concluding with her signature twists.
Meet Rochelle Weinstein, the USA Today bestselling author of This is Not How it Ends and get to know more about her latest book, When We Let Go.
Rochelle Weinstein | Author We Are Made Of Stars is a work of art - suspenseful, intricate and completely redemptive.
